reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Watson's lectures are incredibly engaging. Her passion for physics is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chen's programming assignments are challenging but rewarding. Great hands-on learning experience.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lab sessions are well-organized and insightful. She's always willing to help students.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez knows his stuff, but his teaching style can be a bit dry at times.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's case studies are fascinating. She really brings the subject to life.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Williams has a wealth of knowledge. His anecdotes make history lessons memorable.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's experiments are both educational and exciting. She prioritizes lab safety too.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson's reading list is extensive, but his feedback on essays could be more constructive.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's discussions on current social issues are thought-provoking and balanced.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's lectures are hard to follow. The course content needs better organization.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's virtual museum tours are a highlight. She brings art to life even in online classes.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Novak encourages critical thinking. His debates are always lively and informative.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's field trips are eye-opening. She's deeply committed to environmental education.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wright's lectures can be abstract, but he's patient with questions and explanations.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Rossi's enthusiasm for brain research is infectious. Her labs are cutting-edge.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's real-world business examples make complex concepts easier to grasp.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis creates a supportive environment for language learning. Her assignments are creative.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Prof. Ali's global perspective enriches class discussions. He's well-versed in current affairs.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's stargazing sessions are unforgettable. She makes the cosmos feel accessible.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Peters has industry experience, but his lectures could use more practical applications.
